Subject: Disk space allocation after instance migration
Description:
Hello,

Privatbank is mograting from Ubuntu 18 to Ubuntu 22 AWS instance. The migration is planned for today 19:00 Kyiv time.

We need a Netwrix engineer to allocate additional disk space after the first launch via SSH.

This task needs to be done swiftly, because client has a large scope and we need to swiftly allocate disk space to  assure no disruptions in production enviornment.
Solution_Comment__c: Solved by increasing the disk space from the server's backend
